code: import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import trash from"../images/Trash.svg";import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(_ref){let{card,onCardClick,onCardLike,onCardDelete}=_ref;const{currentUser}=useContext(CurrentUserContext);const{link,name,owner,likes}=card;const isOwn=owner._id===currentUser._id;const isLiked=card.likes.some(like=>like._id===currentUser._id);const cardLikeButtonClassName=`elements__like-button ${isLiked?"active":""}`;const cardDeleteButtonClassName=`elements__delete-button ${isOwn?"elements__delete-button-hidden":""}`;function handleClick(){onCardClick(card);}function handleDeleteClick(){onCardDelete(card);}function handleCardLike(){onCardLike(card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"elements__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:handleDeleteClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"elements__delete-icon",src:trash,alt:"delete button icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"elements__card-image",src:link,alt:"",onClick:handleClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"elements__wrapper-text-and-like-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"elements__card-name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"elements__like",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"likeButton",type:"button",className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleCardLike}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"elements__like-counter",children:likes.length})]})]})]});}export default Card;
